original_text: And Boaz said unto the elders, and unto all the people, Ye are witnesses this day, that I have bought all that was Elimelech's, and all that was Chilion's and Mahlon's, of the hand of Naomi.
korean_text: 보아스가 장로들과 모든 백성에게 이르되 내가 엘리멜렉과 기룐과 말론에게 있던 모든 것을 나오미의 손에서 산 일에 너희가 오늘 증인이 되었고

sentences.original_text: And Boaz said unto the elders,
that I have bought all that was Elimelech's,
and all that was Chilion's and Mahlon's,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기룐과 말론의 모든 것을 샀으며,
